MS MCQs

    Train and package an Azure machine learning module for deployment to IoT Edge device

    »

    1. A company is deploying a machine learning models to edge devices in production. The company must deploy the model to a variety of development hardware environments. Currently, they are creating specific implementation per environment. This causes issues with dependencies. What alternate method could they use to manage dependencies?

      The company could use a webservice.

      The company could use specific libraries per environment.

      The company could use containers.


    2. The workflow for deploying models in production is:

      Register the model - Prepare to deploy - Deploy the model to the compute target - Test the deployed model as a web service.

      Prepare to deploy - Register the model - Deploy the model to the compute target - Test the deployed model as a web service.

      Deploy the model to the compute target - Register the model - Prepare to deploy - Test the deployed model as a web service.


    3. After the model is packaged in a container, which of these steps could be undertaken to optimize performance?

      The model is retrained.

      The model is profiled for ideal CPU and memory usage.

      The model features are reengineered to optimize performance.
